pkgmetadata.longdescription: Subgroup Discovery Algorithms for R // Implementation of some algorithms for the data mining task called "subgroup discovery" without package dependencies. It also provide a Shiny App for make the analysis easier. The algorithms works with data sets provided in KEEL or ARFF format files or data.frame objects. If you want more information about KEEL format, please refer to http://www.keel.es .
